description: Micah Brandt told me he had never been willingly tickled before, so I knew this scene was going to be super fun. I wasn’t wrong there. All I had to do was touch his ribs and he immediately started squirming to get free from the tickle chair. Micah is a big, muscular man, so it’s a good thing I had him tied up. As much as Micah’s body turned out to be quite ticklish, his size 11 feet were even more so. The more his adorable laugh filled the room, the more I proceeded to hit every sensitive spot on his big feet with my fingers and tickle tools. What a blast!
title: Micah gets Tickled Tormented
